overview:
Kut is EVP of Sales and Academic Relations at GoingOn. He has a career dedicated to technologies focused on enhancing the education experience.

Before becoming an executive at GoingOn, Kurt managed two of the three higher education sales teams at Blackboard. He took regions that we underperforming, brought in new sales and account management talent, and turned these regions into the top performing teams.

Prior to Blackboard, Kurt spent 10 years at Apple in the Education division. He was instrumental in developing the campus rep program, hiring hundreds of college students to focus on sales and marketing efforts at their respective campuses.

Kurt has a Accounting and Finance degrees from the University of Nebraska at Lincoln. He currently commutes between his home in Denver and his company in San Francisco. He enjoys traveling, trying new wine, and spending time with his daughter.
